SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
CONTACT DATA AND AUDIENCES
eCommerce Dimension Package

Use the eCommerce Dimension Package in Audience Builder to import data directly into standard data extension templates.

These 31 dimension packages perform advanced segmentation on subscribers who previously purchased products. Your ecommerce data feeds must contain identifiable subscribers using either a subscriber key or the SubscriberID from Marketing Cloud Engagement.

Use query activities to join SubscriberID to a system data view. This action populates the Subscriber Key field in the data extension templates.

With the eCommerce Dimension Package, you can identify subscribers by these attributes.

Purchased a specific product by name or hierarchy
By date or number of days since last purchase
Browsed your website for specific products
By categories but didn’t purchase (requires the Web Analytics dimension package)
Overdue for a specific product or product hierarchy
Categorized as bargain shoppers, high-value customers, or seasonal customers
Prerequisites

To use these dimension packages, contact your account executive. Other requirements include the Audience Builder Drill Tree configuration and access to ecommerce data feeds.

eCommerce Package Configuration Guide
The eCommerce Dimension Package includes standard dimension packages derived from a standardized data extension–based data model. This functionality provides a turnkey solution that brings ecommerce and purchase data into Marketing Cloud Engagement without the need for a costly custom implementation.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
